name: AWESOME PLATFORMER (AAhmed9)
description:
This is the first time I used visual scripting on Unity. It is similar to Unreal Engine, as a result, I have sufficient knowledge to create Awesome Platformer. With my current knowledge of visual scripting on Unity, I developed physics, moving platforms, coins, moving hazards and multiple levels.

Controls: A (Move Left), D (Move Right), Spacebar (Jump), Double Spacebar (Double Jump), 

Tip: After you finish a level, press the spacebar to continue to the next level.
